text: "When I'm with You" is a 1980 song by Los Angeles band Sparks and taken from their 9th studio album Terminal Jive. It went to number 1 in France and number 14 in Australia. It did not chart in the United States. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Sparks (band) songs Category:Disco songs
title: When I'm with You (Sparks song)
